To: Arlin Aranha; Felix Roig <Felix.Roig@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Tarek Naoum <Tarek.Naoum@chalhoub.com>

Date: 2024-10-10 09:12
Subject: Shipping contracts 
--------------------------------------------------
Dear all , 

Hope you are doing well !

I would like to thank you for your effort and commitment to finalize the freight agreements . 
Finally, we have completed the 4 contracts that cover our air and land freight spend . I am sharing with you the final signed and completed contracts from each supplier . 

Wish you a great day ahead . 
Best regards, 
Sonia



SONIA MAKHOUKH​​​​	
MANAGER ‑ PROCUREMENT	
M.C.T. FZE	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
